CustomField.formula:
If(ISNULL(Resolution_Date__c),
(today() - datevalue(CreatedDate) - 2*( floor((today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((datevalue(CreatedDate) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))),
(datevalue(Resolution_Date__c) - datevalue(CreatedDate) - 2*( floor((datevalue(Resolution_Date__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((datevalue(CreatedDate) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))))
CustomField.label: Days Discrepancy Outstanding
